content.rendered:
We have a wide range of trusted associates who assist in the provision of specialist services on our various consulting roles and projects.

Associated experts include:

  • Metallurgy
  • Tribology
  • Post-Harvest Foodstuff Analysis & Investigation
  • Forensic Materials Testing
  • Fuel Management Investigations and Fuel Analysis

jetpack-related-posts.title: Ports & Harbours, Shipyards & Terminals
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Our Ports & Harbour team specialises in providing Port Capacity and Operational Simulation studies. Utilising our dual-purpose software package BRAEVURA ©, we are able to accurately model existing and future traffic flows using AIS data to predict port capacity, berth utilisations and to assess the effects on marine traffic of…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Jakub Cichowicz | Technical Expert
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: London | +44 (0) 7766 835 402Discipline: Naval architecture, Master’s Degree, PhD. CEng.Specialism: Computational Fluid Dynamics; Corrosion and Erosion; Collision & Grounding; Design - Ship Design; Dynamic Positioning; Finite Element Analysis; Forensic Casualty Investigation; Hull & Machinery; Noise and Vibration; Power Generation and Distribution; Propulsion System; Risk Assessment; Sea Trial;…

jetpack-related-posts.title: David Duffy | General Manager, Abu Dhabi
Geotechnical Engineering
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Our geotechnical staff are specialists in jack up leg penetration analyses, offshore site investigations, and geotechnical design and installation analysis for offshore oil & gas and wind turbine foundations.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Santosh George  |  Group QHSE Manager
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Specialist QHSE consultant and auditor with extensive risk analysis experience covering shipyards and offshore assets.
